article.title: Apps Feature Highlights for Olympic Winter Games
article.author: Rachel Lilly
article.abstract: Thanks to a handful of helpful apps, Olympic fans can follow their favorite athletes even when they're on the go.
article.text: Thanks to a handful of helpful apps, Olympic fans can follow their favorite athletes even when they're on the go. Lucky enough to actually attend the Olympic Winter Games? Check out the free Sochi 2014 Guide, which helps spectators orient themselves. In addition to details on Olympic venues, routes and transportation, this app includes competition photos, news and Push notifications. It's available for iOS, Android, Windows Phone and BlackBerry. Following along from home? The Sochi 2014 Results app contains everything you need to know about competition schedules and results. Select feeds with your favorite topics and get the most relevant news, plus keep up with the medal counts in real time. Again, this app is available for iOS, Android, Windows Phone and BlackBerry. Finally, the NBC Olympic Highlights app for iOS and Android has news, video and photos for every sport. During the nightly live broadcasts, you can use the app as a companion for a unique second screen experience.Will you watch the games?
